阿仙奴上場作客西布朗時，球場上空有兩架飛機帶兩條橫額在上空飛過，一條支持雲格，一條反雲格。當日負責駕駛「撐雲」飛機的機師透露，原來發起撐雲Banner的組織是來自香港！

據當日有份駕駛「撐雲」飛機的機師指，Banner是由一群來自香港的支持者合資，是在對西布朗當天賽場上空的第二條Banner。

第一條是由反雲的英國球迷在Crowdfunding 眾籌後租用飛機掛上Banner示威。

「集資展示 [behind the #RespectAW banner] 的球迷來自香港，他們希望大家知道香港有一班撐雲格的球迷。

「當日任務十分困難，因為他們住在不同地方 ，我要理解任務的危險性和天氣情況。我明白要籌得資金十分困難，所以他們期望總會高。」

Jurgen Klopp says he was “surprised” that Chris Coleman didn’t bother phoning him prior to naming Liverpool’s Ben Woodburn in the senior Wales squad.

Klopp on Woodburn: "This should not be a criticism, but when you call up a player, a 17-year-old I thought it would be possible to call me."

Klopp: "I’m not sure if Chris knows him well. He didn’t play in the team so far for Coleman I think. But no call."

Klopp on Woodburn: "We didn’t hide him. We used him. He is a fixed part of our training. He can deal with the nomination for Wales 100%."

Klopp on Woodburn: "It’s a little bit like my situation. As long as you give me time, as long as we give him time, everything will be good."

Klopp on Woodburn: "He has to learn & develop and improve. There are now two managers responsible for him. Until now, it was only my job."

On Woodburn’s contribution…

We know what Ben is capable of and what he is already able to do. My first job is to help these boys so that they can be the best. In this case, Ben Woodburn. There’s a lot of things to do, especially to keep the public away as long as possible. That’s quite a difficult thing to do. But on the other hand, we only bring him in because we want to use him. So that means when he’s on the pitch he’s absolutely allowed to score goals, to prepare situations, to make crosses – how Trent did, for example. So, all good. I’m really happy for him. The only problem is I’m a little bit afraid about you [the media]. That’s why I’m so quiet on this. Think and do what you want, but don’t write anything – only ‘Goalscorer, Ben Woodburn.’ Done. Quite a challenge!

【明報專訊】足總主席梁孔德昨在電台節目中，透露上周在歐聯打入8強的應屆英超冠軍李斯特城，將在7月來港參與英超挑戰盃，而另一參賽球隊則是「紅軍」利物浦。

梁孔德昨出席由「桂神」黃興桂主持的電台節目，期間談及7月上演的英超挑戰盃時，除確認將於香港及上海各舉行一天比賽外，又大爆參賽球隊：「利物浦、李斯特城都會來，第3隊則視乎聯賽排名。早前擔心李城若降班，便不能參賽，如今李城已入（歐聯）8強，相信吸引力相當大。」

今季，英格蘭中場占士米拿在利物浦主帥高普的麾下，獲安排出任左閘的角色，效果相當理想，但前者日前卻意外於訪問中，表示自己毫不喜愛這個決定。

占士米拿說：「老實說，我不希望成為一位左閘，亦不喜歡這樣的工作，但作為一名球員，我會100%依從教練的決定，而這個決定是對球隊有益的話，我便會義無反顧的接受命令。」

「一支球隊大約有25人，但能夠正選上陣的只有11位，所以高普的決定，我會完全接受，而我似乎亦頗有出任後衛的潛質。」

Premier League clubs watch Hamburger SV’s Bobby Wood
Scouts from Liverpool, West Ham, Stoke City, Everton, Southampton & Leicester City all watched Hamburger SV’s Bobby Wood in their game against Borussia Mönchengladbach, per SportBild.

The United States international only joined Hamburg this summer from Union Berlin – but has since gone on to be Markus Gisdol’s top scorer with 10 goals in all competitions.

Should HSV be relegated, Wood could be available for as little as €5 million.

Timo Wener: “I feel at home here at RB right now.”
Speaking with SportBild, RB Leipzig forward Timo Werner stated that it would be “special” to play for a club like Liverpool — however, right now he’s happy in Germany.

“I feel at home here at RB right now,” said the 21-year-old. “Leipzig can continue to grow, and if I could be a part of it I’d be delighted.”

Following his move in summer from Stuttgart, Werner has scored 14 Bundesliga goals, which has earned him his first call-up to the national side.

“If you were to play at Anfield and hear the fans sing ‘You’ll Never Walk Alone,’ it would certainly be something special,” added Werner. “England has a different feel, but I am also still young player.”

日前，羅斯托夫前鋒阿斯蒙（Sardar Azmoun）於訪問中表示，利物浦曾於今年1月向自己發出邀請，但這名伊朗國腳最終決定拒絕。

對此，阿斯蒙說：「利物浦今冬曾希望將我簽下，但我認為那時不是應該轉會的時候，皆因我或許只能在晏菲路，得到寥寥無幾的上陣時間，只能於餘下的半季內，擔任替身的角色，所以我那時並不希望離隊，以免浪費時間。」

「當然，利物浦是一家出色的大球會，我亦希望自己能夠於日後加盟這般的豪門，但我並不著急。」
